{{var active = it.defaultTab || null;}} {{~it.tabs :value:index}}{{? value.align == 'left' }} {{=it.buttonTemplate({ outer: it, value: value, index: index, active: (active == value.id) && !!value.enabled })}} {{if ((active == value.id) && !!value.enabled) { active = null} }} {{?}}{{~}} {{for (var i = it.tabs.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) { }}{{? it.tabs[i].align == 'right' || !it.tabs[i].align }} {{=it.buttonTemplate({ outer: it, value: it.tabs[i], index: i, active: (active == it.tabs[i].id) && !!it.tabs[i].enabled})}} {{if ((active == it.tabs[i].id) && !!it.tabs[i].enabled) { active = null} }} {{?}}{{ } }}
